attributes.description: KIA PINETOWN we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre- Owned vehicles, belonging to a multinational company who is South Africa's biggest motor group which owns 340 dealers country wide. All our vehicles have to pass a DEKRA Condition Report, DEKRA roadworthy certificate and an 125 point  quality check at our workshop for your peace of mind motoring. We will tailor make a finance package that will suit your pocket. Kia Pinetown can offer extended warranties and service plans on all vehicles. Trade in's accepted and nationwide delivery can be arranged, call now, one of our Sales executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you with a warm cup of coffee at our dealership

attributes.description: At Kia Northcliff we pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check, roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. CALL NOW and you could be driving off in the car of yours dreams.  Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees. At

attributes.description: The Mazda CX30 is one of the newest additions to the Mazda range and is also our 2nd 7th generation car. The Individual is our highest specification. Some of the stunning features include, a 2.0 engine and 6 speed tiptronic gearbox,, leather interior and electric drivers seat with 2 position memory, 12 speaker BOSE sound system, heads up display, dual zone climate control, 18 inch alloy wheels, Apple Car Play/Android Auto, drive away lock, smart advanced keyless access, auto lights and wipers, LED lighting with daytime running lights, rear park distance control with reverse camera and a full leather interior. The CX30 also comes with a 3 year unlimited mileage Service Plan and Warranty, which can be extended and Roadside Assistance.
